Software name:                           OPUS Codec
Brief:                                   The audio codec library to support OGG file and opus file.
Path:                                    mcu/prebuilt/middleware/third_party/audio, dsp/prebuilt/middleware/third_party/dspalg/celt_decoder, dsp/prebuilt/middleware/third_party/dspalg/celt_encoder
Category:                                Open source software(OSS)
Software maker:                          Xiph.Org Foundation
OSS download link:                       http://opus-codec.org/
License:                                 The 3-Clause BSD License
Evidence of license agreement:           https://opus-codec.org/license/
Version:                                 1.1.4
